content:
i Loki the Great will use my soothsaying powers to anticipate a relatively painless midterm season for all the students and faculty of the College PERIOD

Libra Sept PERIOD   Oct PERIOD 

Highfive the next person you see PERIOD No actually PERIOD Do it PERIOD Seriously this is not a request PERIOD Do it or I will find you and force feed you an entire issue of the Manitou Messenger PERIOD Literally PERIOD I will force you to consume it intellectually and then physically PERIOD

Scorpio Oct PERIOD   Nov PERIOD 

Your mind will be blown when you suddenly realize that the lyrics to Weird Als White and Nerdy apply to  percent of the student body PERIOD

Sagittarius Nov PERIOD   Dec PERIOD 

Ringbyspring does not apply to freshmen PERIOD So find an attractive upperclassman ask her or him out by putting a note in her or his PO box and then follow her or him around the next Pause dance PERIOD If that doesnt work try sitting in the broomball rink with a sign that says free kisses. capricorn Dec PERIOD   Jan PERIOD 

You will realize the importance of eating your bag lunch inside when a squirrel steals your turkey on multigrain  no cheese PERIOD

Aquarius Jan PERIOD   Feb PERIOD 

Stay safe at those U of M parties over the weekend lest you give St PERIOD Olaf students a worse reputation than they already have PERIOD

Pisces Feb PERIOD   March 

Stay safe and dont eat too much cheese at your esoteric blacktie parties at the U of M this weekend lest you give St PERIOD Olaf professors a worse reputation than they already have PERIOD

Aries March   April 

Good karma is hot this week PERIOD Tell your favorite custodial workers just how beautiful they are PERIOD Maybe even give them a giftcard to their favorite eatery PERIOD

Taurus April   May 

Lime green is the new black PERIOD

Gemini May   June 

You will fail to break your breakfast routine for the fifth straight week PERIOD Maybe its time to top your cheesy eggs with picante sauce PERIOD Spice up your life

Cancer June   July 

Youll discover that in order to reconnect to your Italian heritage you should clench your thumb and middle finger together while shaking your wrist and repeating Lasagna over and over again PERIOD

Leo July   Aug PERIOD 

You will meet the love of your life in Regents when you both exit lab with hideous goggle marks PERIOD

Virgo Aug PERIOD  Sept PERIOD 

October is the month of philanthropy PERIOD Treat your favorite Mess writers to a Dessert After Dark from the Cage PERIOD Loki prefers the apple crisp  la mode PERIOD
title: Horoscopes: October 17, 2014 â€“ The Olaf Messenger
name: St. Olaf College
